تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear Sender,

Thank you for your claim submission

Kindly allow up to 10 business days for the claim to be processed. You can view status of your claim by visiting https://smartcarebycigna.neuron.ae/ <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/gQxtC3KMDuZv2lmSgfliQpGaa?domain=smartcarebycigna.neuron.ae>  or SmartCare by Cigna mobile app.

Please see below document requirements and ensure you have submitted the right documents for timely processing:
Must have
• Invoices
• Payment receipts/ proof of payment
• Diagnosis

Kindly allow up to 10 business days for the claim to be processed. You can view status of your claim by visiting https://smartcarebycigna.neuron.ae/ <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/gQxtC3KMDuZv2lmSgfliQpGaa?domain=smartcarebycigna.neuron.ae>  or SmartCare by Cigna mobile app.

Please see below document requirements and ensure you have submitted the right documents for timely processing:
Must have
• Invoices
• Payment receipts/ proof of payment
• Diagnosis

If applicable
• Medical Report
• Prescription
• Results of any tests performed
• Breakdown of treatment (i.e. x-rays, scan, laboratory test, physiotherapy, etc.)
• Discharge summary for inpatient cases (hospital stays)

If you do not receive your payment after 10 working days, please call the Helpline at 800-SMARTCARE for details of settlement. Alternatively you can send an email to the Customer Service Team at smartcare.support@neuron.ae to check on the status of your outstanding claim.
In certain cases, if the claim requires further information or additional documents, you will be notified by email on these requirements. Kindly provide the requested information in a timely manner so that the claim can be re-processed.
Please note that this email does not guarantee payment of the said claim. Settlement of the claim will be subject to receipt of all required documents and the claim will be assessed as per policy and medical necessity.

Thank you and regards,
SmartCare Claims Reimbursement Team
Email: Smartcare.claims@neuron.ae
